attributes.action: We want schools to be a non school uniform environment
attributes.additional_details: Teaches are allowed in most schools to wear what they want, some more stricter than others, but we think that students should be seen to be able to handle the maturity levels their teachers have
attributes.background: We think that it is inequitable that students do not get to wear their own clothing, this would help students by: expressing themselves,to gain confidence in their appearance, and students and teachers were will be seen as one, and not as higher in status
